uk.co.greedygull

Class Basicgame

  • Object
    • Game
      • Basicgame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApplicationListener

    public class Basicgame
extends Game
    The core game class that is initiated upon runtime, this creates the orthographic camera and sprite batch used by all other classes. As well as the preferences used to store persistent high score data.
    Author:
    Matej
